alert.note: Alert for Perry; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 6:56AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Perry, central Saline and central Pulaski Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 655 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wye Mountain, or 10 miles southeast of Perryville, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Benton... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... Southwest Little Rock... Shannon Hills... Argenta... Houston... Otter Creek... Little Italy... Roland in Pulaski County... Geyer Springs... Mabelvale... Salem in Saline County... Levy... Williams Junction... State Fairgrounds... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for central Arkansas.
